name: Sofitel Strasbourg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this is a good hotel in a very good location. The hotel is just outside the old city. If you are a tourist (as we were) and want to spend your time in the traffic free old city, but arrived in a car and want to be able to park it , this is your place. The hotel has its own parking, under the building and the cost is reasonable (22 euros a day) and there is street parking around it, which is free overnight. (until 9am.).
reviews.title: Good hotel, excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a "superior room", which was comfortable with a separate working area, free wi-fi and all the usual amenities, plus an espresso coffee machine.
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.text: Everything works and is spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is very friendly and helpful, the concierge knows everything and will gladly share it with you.
reviews.title: Very good. Excellent staff

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay in Strasbourg, especially the Sofitel. It was to be our treat to a nice hotel and we weren't disappointed. We had a twin room overlooking a beautiful old church. The room was really big and the staff we exceptionally helpful. We didnt eat at the hotel at all as there were so many lovely patisseries in Strasbourg for breakfast. They organised a tour for us at short notice to the old convent and the Alsace region which I would highly recommend doing, there was only 5 people on the tour and the guide was amazing. The old city is within walking distance and there are heaps of amazing restaurants too. Overall would recommend to anyone staying in Strasbourg and would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Excellent location, lovely outlook.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We love the Sofitel hotels, and have just positive things to say about this hotel. Good and friendly service. We ate at the restaurant GOH, magnificent! Very high gourmet class. The room was spacious and had a nice decor. Good drinks at the bar :)
reviews.title: Good location in Strasbourg

reviews.text: The hotel is close to the shopping area :) :)

reviews.text: Everything was wonderful here, a perfect place to start a tour of Strasbourg, except breakfast on the monday morning. Twice we ordered and in the end gave up waiting for an omelette .
reviews.title: Disappointing stay

reviews.text: We had extremely helpful advice on booking for dinner as the hotel restaurant had closed.
reviews.title: I love Sofitel chain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bed was like sleeping on a cloud! The room is nice, lots of space, and clean. Good location, within walking distance to all the shops in the city. For a small fee, they can stamp and post your mail for you, very helpful! I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: legendary sofitel service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in Strasbourg for a conference, so stayed at an Accor hotel because we are members.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with outstanding staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I recently spent three evenings at this hotel located in a charming square alongside a picturesque historic church. The location is in the central area of town just steps from the main sites. We received an upgrade to a superior double which included an extremely comfortable bed and all modern conveniences, free interner access and great air conditioning. The breakfast area and the bar have really nice outdoor seating areas with a nice views of the square. Service was first rate and the concierge, front desk personnel and door staff couldn't have been nicer.
reviews.title: Soothing oasis in a charming square

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights one week apart travelling too and from Italy. Very good hotel close to the centre, excellent parking, excellent rooms. The only criticism would be the poor air conditioning. We stayed in 2 rooms 215 and 112 as I recall, it was warm outside but not particularly hot and both rooms were inadequately air conditioned on max cool. Would not like to stay in the middle of summer!!
reviews.title: Sofitel Strasbourg

description: Located at the crossroads of Europe, these luxury Sofitel Strasbourg hotel accommodations are near the Cathedral, the Petite France area, and the city's finest museums and boutiques. A cosmopolitan atmosphere and complete mastery of the art of service distinguish us from rival Strasbourg France hotels. This Strasbourg center hotel is equally suited to business trips and leisure travel -- 15 minutes from the new railway station of the European TGV (high-speed train).
